mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM_QNA (BOARD_ID, comment_no, MEMBER_ID, SUBSTANCE, REGIST_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{boardId}, NVL((SELECT MAX(comment_no) FROM COMM_QNA), 0) + 1, #{memberId}, #{substance}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
